class.description: The ID of the class to transfer the value of an attribute modifier to. See [Value Modifying Power Classes](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/attribute_modify_transfer) for possible values.
class.markdownDescription: The ID of the class to transfer the value of an attribute modifier to. See [Value Modifying Power Classes](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/attribute_modify_transfer) for possible values.

attribute.description: The namespace and ID of the attribute to get the value from.
attribute.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the attribute to get the value from.

multiplier.description: Determines the multiplier for the value.
multiplier.markdownDescription: Determines the multiplier for the value.
